subject: Regarding Validity period of Multiple Journey Ticket
text: 9Tcity <ey ` VTHT gifera5ru Phone 91-11-25074100/2507 (Ts3 5a67 37 TITTRTT 47R4) Fax 91-11-25093507/250g Extn. 2223/231 8/2468/2 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport & Highways) G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka_ New Delhi-110045 No.' NHAI/ 13013/ CMD-CO/ 3/Policy on Toll 26.5.2003 Circular No. NHAL/COMMERCLAL OPERATIONI 19 Sub: Regarding Validity period of Multiple Journey Ticket Presently for public funded projects, multiple   journey ticket issued @ 1.5 times of single rate, as per present practice, is valid till midnight of the Of issuance, I has been decided that with immediate effect; multiple journey ticket will be valid for 24 hours from the date/ time of its issue. The above change will;; however;. not be implemented on the stretches/ bridges where the collection %f fee is through a franchisee till their present term is over unless the practice of 24 hour's validity is already in vogue. This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Ls> MM M Lohia) General Manager (CO) To: AlL PIUs/ CMUs submitted for favour of information to: AlL Members/ CGMs/ CVO All GMs PS to Chairman Chief Engineer(PIC), MoRT&H, New Delhi, for information: 2: mmlohia | neelam | Gentolluithministry doc Mvww NHAL day Copy
